Key Match Events: Kylian Mbappé scored the fastest hat-trick in France national team history
Randal Kolo Muani scored in the 43rd minute
Jonathan Clauss scored in the 70th minute
Kylian Mbappé sealed the win with a goal in the 85th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Kylian Mbappé revealed he was an 'unhappy man' at PSG and is set to join Real Madrid
Manager Didier Deschamps praised Kylian Mbappé's leadership and form
Kylian Mbappé has been involved in 80 goals for France in 78 games
Post-Match Reflections: Kylian Mbappé celebrated his move to Real Madrid in style
Forward Bradley Barcola made his France debut and provided an assist
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Moris denied Mbappé from close range before the half-hour mark
France play Canada on Sunday in Bordeaux in their last warm-up match before Euro 2024 starts on June 14
Others: Luxembourg missed out on their first-ever major tournament with a 2-0 loss to Georgia in their Euro 2024 qualification playoff semi-final
